Filters System

Система фильтрации файлов.

Base Filters

class Filter[source]

Bases: ABC, Generic[T]

Abstract base class for file filters.

Filters categorize files into groups for organization.

abstractmethod get_category(file)[source]

Returns the category name for a given file.

Parameters:

file (File[TypeVar(T)]) – File to categorize.

Return type:

str

Returns:

Category name as string.

abstractmethod get_order()[source]

Returns the application order priority.

Return type:

int

Returns:

Integer representing filter application order.

abstractmethod get_name()[source]

Returns the filter name.

Return type:

str

Returns:

Filter name as string.

is_applicable(file)[source]

Determines if filter is applicable to a file.

Parameters:

file (File[TypeVar(T)]) – File to check applicability for.

Return type:

bool

Returns:

True if filter can be applied, False otherwise.

get_fallback_category()[source]

Returns fallback category for inapplicable files.

Return type:

str

Returns:

Fallback category name.

class CompositeFilter(filters)[source]

Bases: Filter

Combines multiple filters into a sequential filtering pipeline.

Parameters:

filters (List[Filter])

filters

List of filters sorted by application order.

Parameters:

Applies all filters sequentially and returns category path.

Filter Implementation

class ByteSizeStepFilter(step_bytes, order=1)[source]

Bases: Filter

Filters files by size using configurable byte steps.

Categories are named in megabytes for readability.

Parameters:

  • step_bytes (int)

  • order (int)

class DurationFilter(step_seconds=60.0, order=2)[source]

Bases: Filter

Filters files by duration using configurable time steps.

Primarily used for audio and video files.

Parameters:

  • order (int)

Filter Registry

class FilterRegistry[source]

Bases: object

Registry for managing both built-in and plugin filters.

_filters

Dictionary mapping filter names to factory functions.

__init__()[source]
_register_builtin_filters()[source]

Registers all built-in filter implementations.

_create_filter_factory(filter_class)[source]

Creates a filter factory function.

Parameters:

filter_class – Filter class to create factory for.

Returns:

Factory function that instantiates the filter.

register_filter(name, filter_factory)[source]

Registers a built-in filter.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Filter name for registration.

  • filter_factory (Callable) – Factory function that creates filter instances.

create_filter(name, config)[source]

Creates a filter instance by name with configuration.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Name of the filter to create.

  • config (Dict[str, Any]) – Configuration parameters for the filter.

Returns:

Instantiated filter object.

Raises:

ValueError – If filter name is not found.

get_available_filters()[source]

Returns list of all available filter names.

Return type:

List[str]

Returns:

List of built-in and plugin filter names.

get_filter_info(filter_name)[source]

Returns information about a specific filter.

Parameters:

filter_name (str) – Name of the filter to get info for.

Return type:

Optional[Dict[str, Any]]

Returns:

Dictionary with filter information, or None if not found.
